mapper.select: select to_char(pdate,'YY-MM-DD')as d,seller,sum(proceed) as sum from proceeds where pdate >=#{date1} and #{date2}> pdate and seller=#{seller} group by to_char(pdate,'YY-MM-DD'),seller order by d asc
